attributes.action: Ban All Face Masks and Face Coverings in Public Areas
attributes.additional_details:
By promoting transparency, we can restore trust and connection within our communities. Banning face coverings will also support law enforcement efforts, ensuring a safer environment during protests by encouraging peaceful dialogue. In a society that values openness, this measure can strengthen community ties and reduce crime rates.

We urge the government to consider this petition seriously for the betterment of all UK citizens.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call on the UK government to ban face masks and coverings in public areas, particularly at protests. This ban will enhance public safety, as visible faces foster accountability and deter criminal behaviour, including theft and vandalism.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Prohibit the wearing of all full-face coverings in public spaces
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/723131
